name: Pet Bubble Shooter
description:
Pet Bubble Shooter 2016 is a bubble game, but the way to play it is different. The number of bubbles used to eliminate bubbles on screen and get the fruit is specific.
The levels seems easy, come and win 3 stars.

How to play:
1.Tap where you want the bubble.
2.To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
3.Use the limited bubbles and collect all the candy to level up.

Features:
- easy to operate
- it is suitable for everyone, and play it at any time.
- some different theme, e.g., spring, summer, autumn, and etc.
- up to 210 levels
- various kinds of props
